titles.title: Fair Tax Treatment for Insurance Agents' Termination Payments Act of 2000
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for capital gains treatment for certain termination payments received by former insurance salesmen.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/11/2000--Introduced. Fair Tax Treatment for Insurance Agents' Termination Payments Act of 2000 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to consider a qualified termination payment received from an insurance company by a former insurance salesman for such company as a sale or exchange of a capital asset held for more than 12 months.
